name: mcp-sqlite
description: Model Context Protocol (MCP) server that provides comprehensive SQLite database interaction capabilities
author: Justin Parker <jparkerweb@gmail.com> (https://www.equilllabs.com)

scripts.clean: npx rimraf node_modules package-lock.json && npm install
scripts.postinstall: node -e "console.log('\nMCP SQLite server installed! Run with: npx mcp-sqlite-server <database-path>')"
